question: 文字通り
sourceMnemonic: Remember how you learned the words <ja>文字</ja> and <ja>通り</ja>? Well an "avenue" made of "letters" is <vocabulary>literally</vocabulary> <vocabulary>to the letter</vocabulary>. Wink.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a combination of the words <ja>文字</ja> and <ja>通り</ja>, which you learned already, so you should be able to read this one. Just make sure you remember that <ja>とおり</ja> becomes <ja>どおり</ja> because of rendaku.
